query.stmt: select bsc.id,bsc.title,spc.name type,view_times,spu.name create_user,bsc.create_time from bi_policy_regulation bsc left join sys_pa_code spc on bsc.type=spc.code_num and spc.code_table='BI_POLICY_REGULATION' and spc.code_field='TYPE' left join sys_p_user spu on bsc.create_user=spu.id where 1=1 order by create_time desc <#if title??> and bsc.title [like(title)] </#if> <#if content??> and dbms_lob.instr(bsc.content, [content], 1, 1) > 0 </#if>
